pageContext.claim: “Well, think of this, so if Biden gets in, it's closed. He said he's going to close it [the Iron Range in Minnesota].”
pageContext.analysis: There’s no indication Biden plans to “shut down” the Iron Range. Rather, a statement he released made clear he is committed to the area. He wrote: “My Build Back Better plan creates millions of high-paying union jobs manufacturing and building new autos, bridges, water systems, transportation options, and more. My plan will make a historic procurement effort and reshore critical supply chains. Iron Rangers and other American workers will mine and manufacture the materials — including steel — to power that effort.”
